TextView.android:text: 1. Add your name => (No need to prompt this, they can figure it out from the textbox and the placeholder) 2. Click the "Next" button to add your fingerprint => (No need to prompt this, the button should be well labeled 3. Make sure your designated finger is clean to scan => (On screen prompt to clean finger and fingerprint scanner, close popup on button press) 4. Wait for the fingerprint light to turn on => (On screen color indicator, green/red + Written instructions at the top) 5. It might take a few seconds to scan your fingerprint => (When the fingerprint is first detected, change indicator color from 4 to a timer with how long you want them to hold) 6. Repeat for as many fingerprints as needed (If needed, prompt every time to ask if they want to add 1 more) 7. Click the "Finish" button to finish the registration process 8. Send back to home screen with "welcome" popup
